verses.verse: <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>trees,<s%> and <S%H7023>masons,<s%> and <S%H2796>carpenters,<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> him a <S%H1004>house.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3045>perceived<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H3559>established<s%> him <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> for his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> was exalted <S%H5375>on<s%> <S%H4605>high,<s%> for his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>'s sake.
<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> more <S%H802>wives<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of more <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
These are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H3205>children<s%> whom he had in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> <S%H8051>Shammua,<s%> and <S%H7727>Shobab,<s%> <S%H5416>Nathan,<s%> and <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%>

When the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H4886>anointed<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> over all <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> all the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H1732>David:<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of <S%H3318>it,<s%> and went out against <S%H6440>them.<s%>
Now the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H935>come<s%> and made a <S%H6584>raid<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Shall I go <S%H5927>up<s%> against the <S%H6430>Philistines?<s%> Will you <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them into my <S%H3027>hand?<s%>" <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5927>him,<s%> "Go up; for I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>"

So they came <S%H5927>up<s%> to Baal <S%H1188>Perazim,<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> them <S%H1732>there;<s%> and David <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6555>broken<s%> my <S%H341>enemies<s%> by my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> like the <S%H6556>breach<s%> of <S%H4325>waters.<s%> Therefore they <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of that <S%H4725>place<s%> Baal <S%H1188>Perazim.<s%>
They <S%H5800>left<s%> their <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H1732>there;<s%> and David gave <S%H559>commandment,<s%> and they were <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>
The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> yet <S%H3254>again<s%> made a <S%H6584>raid<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> again of <S%H430>God;<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5927>him,<s%> "You shall not go up <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5437>them.<s%> Turn away from <S%H935>them,<s%> and come on them over <S%H4136>against<s%> the mulberry <S%H1057>trees.<s%>

It shall <S%H8085>be,<s%> when you hear the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of <S%H6807>marching<s%> in the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of the mulberry <S%H1057>trees,<s%> that then you shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H4421>battle;<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%> has gone <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you to <S%H5221>strike<s%> the <S%H4264>army<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>"

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H5221>him:<s%> and they struck the <S%H4264>army<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> from <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> even to <S%H1507>Gezer.<s%>
The <S%H8034>fame<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> into all <S%H776>lands;<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>brought<s%> the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of him on all <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
